architectural_notes: Color utilities (e.g., hexToRgb/mixColor) only accept hex values; avoid named colors like "teal" and use theme/default neutral tokens instead.
known_issues: Login fails after clicking the login button due to runtime render error: Invalid hex color "teal" (from FieldCard/getSoftCardBackground color mixing). User requests replacing "teal" with app default neutral color.

existing_features.title: Prevent the post-login dashboard render crash by ensuring FieldCard only passes valid hex colors into soft tint helpers and falls back to the app default color when the stored field color is not a hex value.
Make soft tint color utilities resilient: if the provided color string is not a valid 6-digit hex color, do not throw; instead use the app default color so the UI continues rendering.

projectName: Fix login render crash caused by invalid field color string ("teal") and fall back to app default
